txt.en:
After encountering the elusive Warg, Khanakarg, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold.

As you inspect Khanakarg's fangs, you take care not to cut yourself on the razor-sharp teeth.

You decide to bring this trophy to Belga Defthand, a skilled taxidermist of the Longbeards, that it might be preserved once Gundabad is reclaimed.
Deliver Khanakarg's fangs to Belga Defthand at Steepset
Belga Defthand can be found at Steepset in MÃ¡ttugard.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe in Gundabad. You should deliver it to Belga Defthand, a skilled taxidermist of the Longbeards.
After encountering the elusive Warg, Khanakarg, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold.

'What have you brought me now?'

Belga Defthand inspects Khanakarg's fangs closely, holding them up to the light at Steepset.

'Ah, this shall make a fine trophy! I shall preserve this rare find. Let us hope fewer wargs trouble us in Gundabad in the days to come!'
